‚Ä¢ Red Wave Riders is for God, country, family and America First. Our mission is to shatter the false narratives and lies of a corrupt political system, and media. We accomplish this as each member shares the truth here. Our influence creates a wave on social media reaching millions of Americans on Gab and beyond! 

‚Ä¢ For membership, we desire quality over quantity. We will not tolerate racism, or threats of violence against any member or non-member. Each member of RWR, while being free individuals, are united in one pursuit: Life, Liberty, Justice, and the Pursuit of Happiness.

card.description: We perform, teach and speak around the world on stage and in film.
card.title: Rich & Joyce Swingle

_source.content: Eric Liddell would be 121 today. I've been tracking his birthday ever since the great grandson of Hudson Taylor surprised me with it onstage after performing Beyond the Chariots, my one-man play about Liddell, in Hong Kong. Here's the story: http://www.Blog.RichDrama.com (1/6).We're planning to bring Beyond the Chariots to Paris for the 2024 Summer Olympics, a 100 years after Liddell broke the world record in the 400m during the 1924 Paris Olympics. I'll also perform it in the Eric Liddell Centre in Edinburgh during the Edinburgh Fringe Festival that summer. Appreciate your prayer for a venue/s in Paris for the play and for provision if needed for the trip.
_source.contentraw:
Eric Liddell would be 121 today.

I've been tracking his birthday ever since the great grandson of Hudson Taylor surprised me with it onstage after performing Beyond the Chariots, my one-man play about Liddell, in Hong Kong. Here's the story: http://www.Blog.RichDrama.com (1/6).

We're planning to bring Beyond the Chariots to Paris for the 2024 Summer Olympics, a 100 years after Liddell broke the world record in the 400m during the 1924 Paris Olympics. I'll also perform it in the Eric Liddell Centre in Edinburgh during the Edinburgh Fringe Festival that summer.

Appreciate your prayer for a venue/s in Paris for the play and for provision if needed for the trip.

card.description: The visit of a New York mayor to a southern border city about the issue of immigrants is unprecedented
card.title: New York Mayor Says 'No Room' in His City for Migrants

_source.content: #New_York Mayor Says 'No Room' in His City for Migrants Eric Adams, a Democrat, was also critical of the administration of Democratic U.S. President Joe Biden. Busloads of migrants have been shipped north to New York and other cities by Republican run states. That has exacerbated a housing crisis and a worsening homeless crisis in the city. https://www.voanews.com/a/new-york-mayor-says-no-room-in-his-city-for-migrants/6919855.html?utm_source=ground.news&utm_medium=referral
_source.contentraw:
#New_York Mayor Says 'No Room' in His City for Migrants

Eric Adams, a Democrat, was also critical of the administration of Democratic U.S. President Joe Biden. Busloads of migrants have been shipped north to New York and other cities by Republican run states. That has exacerbated a housing crisis and a worsening homeless crisis in the city.

card.title: Preface

_source.content: http://www.DavidLane1488.com/kdpreface.html #Precept34 üîµ Dory found Sheila's certainty infuriating, but considered it wisest to conceal her anger. Instead she decided to learn more about her captor."How old is this Eric, anyhow?""I think he's about twenty-six," said Linda."Kinda old for a girl that's just turned sixteen, don't you think?""No Kinslander has a right to take a mate and reproduce until he has proven his value to the folk in battle, and killed enemies of our people," Sheila informed her. "That's why most Kinslander men are ten or twenty years older than their mates. When a girl starts having periods and develops womanly attributes and gets 'boy crazy', that's nature saying it's time to mate.""You mean Eric is a killer?""Soldiers kill their enemies and the enemies of their people, don't they?" Linda asked."Oh well, I guess so.""And they still love their mates and children, don't they?""Yeah, I guess so.""So what's the problem?""Ah, I guess this is all too new and sudden for me to get used to," Dory stammered.üü¶
_source.contentraw:
http://www.DavidLane1488.com/kdpreface.html #Precept34

üîµ Dory found Sheila's certainty infuriating, but considered it wisest to conceal her anger. Instead she decided to learn more about her captor.

"How old is this Eric, anyhow?"

"I think he's about twenty-six," said Linda.

"Kinda old for a girl that's just turned sixteen, don't you think?"

"No Kinslander has a right to take a mate and reproduce until he has proven his value to the folk in battle, and killed enemies of our people," Sheila informed her. "That's why most Kinslander men are ten or twenty years older than their mates. When a girl starts having periods and develops womanly attributes and gets 'boy crazy', that's nature saying it's time to mate."

"You mean Eric is a killer?"

"Soldiers kill their enemies and the enemies of their people, don't they?" Linda asked.

"Oh well, I guess so."

"And they still love their mates and children, don't they?"

"Yeah, I guess so."

"So what's the problem?"

"Ah, I guess this is all too new and sudden for me to get used to," Dory stammered.

üü¶

_source.content: Border crossers, living for free in New York City hotel rooms, are fighting staff, drinking all day, and having sex in public, among other things, a whistleblower alleges.As Breitbart News has chronicled for months, Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) has bused tens of thousands of border crossers to the sanctuary city of New York City since April 2022. In return, Mayor Eric Adams (D) has turned the migration into a cash boondoggle for luxury hotels that have received lucrative million-dollar contracts to house hundreds of border crossers.
_source.contentraw:
Border crossers, living for free in New York City hotel rooms, are fighting staff, drinking all day, and having sex in public, among other things, a whistleblower alleges.

As Breitbart News has chronicled for months, Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) has bused tens of thousands of border crossers to the sanctuary city of New York City since April 2022. In return, Mayor Eric Adams (D) has turned the migration into a cash boondoggle for luxury hotels that have received lucrative million-dollar contracts to house hundreds of border crossers.

card.description: It is necessary to write about the apostle Eric vonAnderseck because he is a self-proclaimed apostle of God...and wacked.
card.title: Why write about the "Apostle Eric" vonAnderseck?

_source.content: Just a heads up: This ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù (Second Eighth Week Apostles) stuff is fake. Their slogan is, ‚ÄúWHY WE PROPHESY CHRIST,‚Äù (??) but it‚Äôs actually a cult. The giveaways are listed below.Cult examples include Jim Jones of The People‚Äôs Temple, Joseph Smith of the Mormons, Ellen White of the Seventh Day Adventists, the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of the Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Eric von Anderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology and so on.As far as ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù is concerned, here‚Äôs what it REALLY is:https://carm.org/why-write-about-apostle-eric-vonanderseckhttp://studyoncults.blogspot.com/2008/03/false-apostle-eric-von-anderseck.htmlAs with any Spiritual Gift, it exists for the sole purpose of building up the Body of Jesus. Hebrews 1:1-4 is BEYOND self-explanatory that there are simply no prophets today...PERIOD. Feel free to examine it. There are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. The Old Testament prophets existed to point the way to Jesus. Simply the fact that there is a ‚Äúprophetic‚Äù posting in a public setting and not in a church setting these days is tell-tale in itself that it‚Äôs NOT a prophetic word. This is the A.D. Era now.Anyone reading this, do yourself a HUGE favor and R-U-N...FAST.Those aren‚Äôt prophets.There are no apostles today. An apostle was one of the disciples who was an eyewitness to the ascension of Jesus. The apostle Paul was the lone exception to that scenario but Luke fully explains all of the ‚Äúwhys‚Äù and ‚Äúhows‚Äù around it when he wrote the book of Acts as well as in 1 Corinthians 5:5-8. Before his conversion on the Damascus Road, the apostle Paul was known as Saul of Tarsus.  James comes to mind. Simon Peter comes to mind. John comes to mind. Paul comes to mind. Jesus ascended into Heaven CENTURIES ago. There‚Äôs a big difference between an apostle and a disciple. 100% of everyone born again is a disciple. One fancy phrase for a disciple would be, ‚Äú...a student of...‚Äù After that would come human servants. Those can be read about in 1 Corinthians 3:5-9, Ephesians 4:11-16 and so on. Someone who conducts a regular Bible study would be more of a teacher. Someone who penned a portion of The Bible would be called an apostle.According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits. In the case of ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù, it‚Äôs, ‚ÄúFail,‚Äù and, ‚ÄúFail,‚Äù respectively. Meanwhile, forever‚Äôs a long time. Praying those involved get it figured out in time! Spooky. The belief system is that this ‚ÄúEric von Anderseck‚Äù clown proclaims himself to be the ‚ÄúApostle to North America‚Äù. In other words, unless he‚Äôs the one ‚Äúhearing from The Lord for you‚Äù, you‚Äôre not hearing from The Lord.

Cult examples include Jim Jones of The People‚Äôs Temple, Joseph Smith of the Mormons, Ellen White of the Seventh Day Adventists, the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of the Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Eric von Anderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology and so on.

As far as ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù is concerned, here‚Äôs what it REALLY is:

https://carm.org/why-write-about-apostle-eric-vonanderseck

http://studyoncults.blogspot.com/2008/03/false-apostle-eric-von-anderseck.html

As with any Spiritual Gift, it exists for the sole purpose of building up the Body of Jesus. Hebrews 1:1-4 is BEYOND self-explanatory that there are simply no prophets today...PERIOD. Feel free to examine it. There are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. The Old Testament prophets existed to point the way to Jesus. Simply the fact that there is a ‚Äúprophetic‚Äù posting in a public setting and not in a church setting these days is tell-tale in itself that it‚Äôs NOT a prophetic word. This is the A.D. Era now.
Anyone reading this, do yourself a HUGE favor and R-U-N...FAST.
Those aren‚Äôt prophets.

There are no apostles today. An apostle was one of the disciples who was an eyewitness to the ascension of Jesus. The apostle Paul was the lone exception to that scenario but Luke fully explains all of the ‚Äúwhys‚Äù and ‚Äúhows‚Äù around it when he wrote the book of Acts as well as in 1 Corinthians 5:5-8. Before his conversion on the Damascus Road, the apostle Paul was known as Saul of Tarsus. James comes to mind. Simon Peter comes to mind. John comes to mind. Paul comes to mind. Jesus ascended into Heaven CENTURIES ago. There‚Äôs a big difference between an apostle and a disciple. 100% of everyone born again is a disciple. One fancy phrase for a disciple would be, ‚Äú...a student of...‚Äù After that would come human servants. Those can be read about in 1 Corinthians 3:5-9, Ephesians 4:11-16 and so on. Someone who conducts a regular Bible study would be more of a teacher. Someone who penned a portion of The Bible would be called an apostle.

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits. In the case of ‚ÄúS8W‚Äù, it‚Äôs, ‚ÄúFail,‚Äù and, ‚ÄúFail,‚Äù respectively. Meanwhile, forever‚Äôs a long time. Praying those involved get it figured out in time! Spooky. The belief system is that this ‚ÄúEric von Anderseck‚Äù clown proclaims himself to be the ‚ÄúApostle to North America‚Äù. In other words, unless he‚Äôs the one ‚Äúhearing from The Lord for you‚Äù, you‚Äôre not hearing from The Lord.

card.title: Biden Admin Failing To Comply With House Classified Doc Probe ‚Äì Finish The Race

_source.content: In what has to be the worse possible timing for the Biden administration, as the new GOP House majority launches their investigation into the Biden crime family activities, multiple classified and top secret documents have been located in 4 different locations controlled by President Joe Biden.As required, the House Oversight Committee is now looking into Biden‚Äôs mishandling of these top-secret documents.But, after promising in a letter on February 4, 2021, to provide the ‚Äúhighest standards of transparency‚Äù in United States history, Biden‚Äôs team is refusing to comply with the latest request for the documents.https://finishtherace.com/eric/biden-admin-failing-to-comply-with-house-classified-doc-probe/?utm_source=FTR%20Newsletter%201&utm_medium=email&utm_content=subscriber_id:46226138&utm_campaign=1673726403%20BOMBSHELL:%20We%20Got%20Our%20Hands...
_source.contentraw:
In what has to be the worse possible timing for the Biden administration, as the new GOP House majority launches their investigation into the Biden crime family activities, multiple classified and top secret documents have been located in 4 different locations controlled by President Joe Biden.

As required, the House Oversight Committee is now looking into Biden‚Äôs mishandling of these top-secret documents.

But, after promising in a letter on February 4, 2021, to provide the ‚Äúhighest standards of transparency‚Äù in United States history, Biden‚Äôs team is refusing to comply with the latest request for the documents.

card.description: Briana Hunter has been hailed by Opera News as ‚Äúa mesmerizing mezzo-soprano with a fiery theatrical presence and dynamic vocalism.
card.title: Briana Hunter will perform at Merkin Hall in New York City on December 6

_source.content: Opera star Briana Hunter pays tribute to African legacy in Julian De La Chica‚Äôs new song cycle: Dispersed and Transcendental Chants, Op. 18.On December 6, American opera singer Briana Hunter (‚Äú‚Ä¶a mezzo-soprano of astounding vocal and dramatic range.‚Äù ‚Äî Jennifer Goltz, Opera News) will perform at Merkin Hall in New York City, accompanied by pianist Eric Sedgwick. The program includes the world premiere of the song cycle ‚ÄúDispersed and Transcendental Chants, Op. 18‚Äù, commissioned by Hunter especially for the occasion and composed by minimalist Juli√°n De La Chica and a selection of works by Chausson, Price, Moore, Adams, Gordon, Arlen and Sondheim. The recital is part of the Tuesday Matinees cycle and is presented by the KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER.For more information visit us now:- https://nyweekly.com/entertainment/opera-star-briana-hunter-pays-tribute-to-african-legacy-in-julian-de-la-chicas-new-song-cycle-dispersed-and-transcendental-chants-op-18/
_source.contentraw:
Opera star Briana Hunter pays tribute to African legacy in Julian De La Chica‚Äôs new song cycle: Dispersed and Transcendental Chants, Op. 18.

On December 6, American opera singer Briana Hunter (‚Äú‚Ä¶a mezzo-soprano of astounding vocal and dramatic range.‚Äù ‚Äî Jennifer Goltz, Opera News) will perform at Merkin Hall in New York City, accompanied by pianist Eric Sedgwick. The program includes the world premiere of the song cycle ‚ÄúDispersed and Transcendental Chants, Op. 18‚Äù, commissioned by Hunter especially for the occasion and composed by minimalist Juli√°n De La Chica and a selection of works by Chausson, Price, Moore, Adams, Gordon, Arlen and Sondheim. The recital is part of the Tuesday Matinees cycle and is presented by the KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER.

For more information visit us now:- https://nyweekly.com/entertainment/opera-star-briana-hunter-pays-tribute-to-african-legacy-in-julian-de-la-chicas-new-song-cycle-dispersed-and-transcendental-chants-op-18/

card.description: President Trump has announced his intent to nominate Charles Canterbury, a known gun grabber, to head the ATF. By Joe Wolverton, II, J.D.
card.title: Trump Plans to Nominate Known Gun-grabber to Head ATF - The New American

_source.content: @ColionNoir Trump Plans to Nominate Known Gun-grabber to Head ATF In a press released published by the Gun Owners of America (GOA), Canterbury‚Äôs contrariety to the prohibition on the infringement of the right to keep and bear arms is set forth for all to read:His name is Chuck Canterbury, and he is the president of the anti-gun Fraternal Order of Police. Sadly, Canterbury has a long track record that should concern gun owners:He‚Äôs testified before Congress to support anti-gunners like Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor and Attorney General Eric Holder. https://thenewamerican.com/trump-plans-to-nominate-known-gun-grabber-to-head-atf/?fbclid=IwAR3u1rpOEjyMZvfsequ2r2hgQNzro7nhh8BBVfFuXGeu5ya_thFl2p-ieKIUnder his watch, the FOP backed Congressional measures to expand the unconstitutional and failing NICS system ‚Äî which is the same system where 95% of the initial denials are false positives.And on the state level, the FOP under his watch has supported Universal Background Checks and opposed Constitutional Carry. https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=209&v=sr40Rj-9epI&feature=emb_title&fbclid=IwAR1X6V7vM2KGFmOyF0ZHa3_MZf3mpomT8EglOfc8fvCVdFmZusDsEw3y0LM https://themachinegunnest.com/were-now-living-out-minority-report-atf-rejects-form-1s-for-homemade-suppressors/?fbclid=IwAR2L5EieuYnAwRBr_0hhR47JmuYAJu34TOq5y0_Rd6WwfJSkwbAeCvvbIZ0 https://www.theblaze.com/news/atf-raids-amish-dairy-farmer-seizes-guns?fbclid=IwAR0s7oO_hZrvI0JyBQTI0uN4tuPfmDZrSOKR4QD_OXzHrEDiLNChjRtQgVw https://peekier.com/?fbclid=IwAR33Op85_-P2515JF3gEInvR3hzlwPA3sFjx-jSvI-UNW1tYnFfjw25M9Rs#!trump+ATF+
_source.contentraw:
@ColionNoir Trump Plans to Nominate Known Gun-grabber to Head ATF In a press released published by the Gun Owners of America (GOA), Canterbury‚Äôs contrariety to the prohibition on the infringement of the right to keep and bear arms is set forth for all to read:
His name is Chuck Canterbury, and he is the president of the anti-gun Fraternal Order of Police. Sadly, Canterbury has a long track record that should concern gun owners:
He‚Äôs testified before Congress to support anti-gunners like Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor and Attorney General Eric Holder. https://thenewamerican.com/trump-plans-to-nominate-known-gun-grabber-to-head-atf/?fbclid=IwAR3u1rpOEjyMZvfsequ2r2hgQNzro7nhh8BBVfFuXGeu5ya_thFl2p-ieKI
Under his watch, the FOP backed Congressional measures to expand the unconstitutional and failing NICS system ‚Äî which is the same system where 95% of the initial denials are false positives.
And on the state level, the FOP under his watch has supported Universal Background Checks and opposed Constitutional Carry. https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=209&v=sr40Rj-9epI&feature=emb_title&fbclid=IwAR1X6V7vM2KGFmOyF0ZHa3_MZf3mpomT8EglOfc8fvCVdFmZusDsEw3y0LM https://themachinegunnest.com/were-now-living-out-minority-report-atf-rejects-form-1s-for-homemade-suppressors/?fbclid=IwAR2L5EieuYnAwRBr_0hhR47JmuYAJu34TOq5y0_Rd6WwfJSkwbAeCvvbIZ0 https://www.theblaze.com/news/atf-raids-amish-dairy-farmer-seizes-guns?fbclid=IwAR0s7oO_hZrvI0JyBQTI0uN4tuPfmDZrSOKR4QD_OXzHrEDiLNChjRtQgVw https://peekier.com/?fbclid=IwAR33Op85_-P2515JF3gEInvR3hzlwPA3sFjx-jSvI-UNW1tYnFfjw25M9Rs#!trump+ATF
+

card.description: ‚ÄúNiemand mag ooit vragen waar een ander konijn was, en iedereen die vroeg ‚ÄòWaar?‚Äô ‚Äì moest het zwijgen worden opgelegd.‚Äù ‚Äì In het verhaal Watership Down ontvlucht een groep konijnen hun woonplaats Sandleford, in afwachting van de dreigende vernietiging ervan door projectontwikkelaars. Ze gaan op zoek naar een veilig, nieuw thuis en tijdens hun avonturen [‚Ä¶]
card.title: Ze beloofden "veilig en effectief"; we kregen "plotseling en onverwacht" - Frontnieuws

_source.content: They promised "safe and effective"; we got ‚Äúsuddenly and unexpectedly‚ÄùWe are one tragedy away from pitchforks and torches...‚ÄúNo one should ever ask where another rabbit was, and anyone who asked 'Where?' ‚Äì had to be silenced.‚Äù ‚Äì In the story Watership Down, a group of rabbits flee their hometown of Sandleford, awaiting its imminent destruction by property developers. They start looking for a safe, new home and during their adventures they come across another rabbit mound called Cowslip. There, all the rabbits are unusually large, friendly and seemingly well-fed. For a moment, the Sandleford rabbits think they've found a safe haven, writes Mark E. Jeftovic .There's just one problem: every so often one of the rabbits goes missing. It turns out that the entire rabbit hill is on a farmer's land, who feeds and cares for them, but sets snares and traps for their pelts from time to time.There's only one rule in Cowslip's Warren: no one is allowed to ask questions or talk about the missing rabbits.I want anyone reading this to come up with two numbers by asking you two questions:Question #1) How many people do you know who have died of COVID?I first heard rumors of a new Coronavirus from China in January 2020 (although it now appears that COVID was already circulating around the world in mid-2019).When I got wind of it, I emailed friends and colleagues to get N95 masks and stock up on groceries and medicine. It looked bad. In February, I was probably one of the first people in town to wear an N95 mask. In March, I started making a spreadsheet with R0, death rates, and doubling times coming from the CDC, WHO, and screaming hysterics like Eric Feigl-Ding:The famous ‚ÄúHMOG Tweet‚Äù.The screen grab above is the famous ‚ÄúHoly Mother Of God‚Äù tweet, which is sometimes speculated to have sounded the bell for the global COVID panic. Feigl-Ding himself calls it a crucial moment, and he has since deleted the tweet. This is archived here .It's still working btw...When it all happened, I was scared at first. My rough model predicted that by the end of May we would have 442,368 cases with a whopping 22,118 fatalities, and that was just in Toronto. At the end of July, there were 1.7 million cases and 88,473 deaths.I've explained before what happened and what made me a skeptic : Every day I added the new numbers of cases and deaths from the city, county, and federal government. By the fall, I knew that the number of cases was nonsense (it didn't matter how many people tested positive on a PCR test) and that lockdowns were a bigger problem than the virus.There wouldn't be 88,000 deaths nationwide, let alone Toronto (the official death toll for all of Canada is now 49,500 - and we also now know that most of those, over 90%, were with COVID and not from COVID. Toronto had about 3,700 total deaths in over two years).I naively thought this was good news. Surely everyone was looking at the data and surely everyone could see by mid-summer that, even adjusted for seasonality and assuming a new wave in the fall, this was nowhere near the THERMONUCLEAR EVENT that some analysts were promoting.We all know what happened instead: By the fall, it had become a full-fledged religion and well on its way to mass-forming psychosis.But in the early days, when things looked really bad, I thought it meant we would probably hear about once a week that someone in our extended family, circle of friends, or co-workers was going to die from this. Ditto for celebrities, the evening news would be flooded with odes and tributes to notable people who had just been felled by COVID. Perhaps one or more of my close relatives would die from this. Maybe I do. It was frightening.From our vantage point here in early 2023, I can think of only three celebs who died with COVID: John Prine, Herman Cain, and much to the delight of the zerocovid madmen: Meatloaf.On January 1, 2022, I suspected the pandemic was mostly over . During the main period of COVID, I lost about four people within my social circle, none to COVID or even to COVID. That figure does not include the two other people close to me who I knew committed suicide during the lockdowns.So without prejudice to the tragedy of those 49,000 Canadians who have succumbed to COVID, my figure for the first question is zero.Question #2) How many people do you know who have died ‚Äúsuddenly and unexpectedly‚Äù in the past 18 months?Recall how I expected to hear at least once a week about relatives, acquaintances and colleagues who had died of COVID, but heard nothing.However, when it comes to family members, friends and acquaintances who have died suddenly and unexpectedly from a heart attack or other unexpected medical event, in the past year to 18 months or so‚Ä¶well, that's a different story.Read morehttps://www.frontnieuws.com/ze-beloofden-veilig-en-effectief-we-kregen-plotseling-en-onverwacht/?utm_source=plugin&utm_medium=notification&utm_id=812096
_source.contentraw:
They promised "safe and effective"; we got ‚Äúsuddenly and unexpectedly‚Äù

We are one tragedy away from pitchforks and torches...

‚ÄúNo one should ever ask where another rabbit was, and anyone who asked 'Where?' ‚Äì had to be silenced.‚Äù ‚Äì In the story Watership Down, a group of rabbits flee their hometown of Sandleford, awaiting its imminent destruction by property developers. They start looking for a safe, new home and during their adventures they come across another rabbit mound called Cowslip. There, all the rabbits are unusually large, friendly and seemingly well-fed. For a moment, the Sandleford rabbits think they've found a safe haven, writes Mark E. Jeftovic .

There's just one problem: every so often one of the rabbits goes missing. It turns out that the entire rabbit hill is on a farmer's land, who feeds and cares for them, but sets snares and traps for their pelts from time to time.

There's only one rule in Cowslip's Warren: no one is allowed to ask questions or talk about the missing rabbits.

I want anyone reading this to come up with two numbers by asking you two questions:
Question #1) How many people do you know who have died of COVID?

I first heard rumors of a new Coronavirus from China in January 2020 (although it now appears that COVID was already circulating around the world in mid-2019).

When I got wind of it, I emailed friends and colleagues to get N95 masks and stock up on groceries and medicine. It looked bad. In February, I was probably one of the first people in town to wear an N95 mask. In March, I started making a spreadsheet with R0, death rates, and doubling times coming from the CDC, WHO, and screaming hysterics like Eric Feigl-Ding:
The famous ‚ÄúHMOG Tweet‚Äù.

The screen grab above is the famous ‚ÄúHoly Mother Of God‚Äù tweet, which is sometimes speculated to have sounded the bell for the global COVID panic. Feigl-Ding himself calls it a crucial moment, and he has since deleted the tweet. This is archived here .

It's still working btw...

When it all happened, I was scared at first. My rough model predicted that by the end of May we would have 442,368 cases with a whopping 22,118 fatalities, and that was just in Toronto. At the end of July, there were 1.7 million cases and 88,473 deaths.

I've explained before what happened and what made me a skeptic : Every day I added the new numbers of cases and deaths from the city, county, and federal government. By the fall, I knew that the number of cases was nonsense (it didn't matter how many people tested positive on a PCR test) and that lockdowns were a bigger problem than the virus.

There wouldn't be 88,000 deaths nationwide, let alone Toronto (the official death toll for all of Canada is now 49,500 - and we also now know that most of those, over 90%, were with COVID and not from COVID. Toronto had about 3,700 total deaths in over two years).

I naively thought this was good news. Surely everyone was looking at the data and surely everyone could see by mid-summer that, even adjusted for seasonality and assuming a new wave in the fall, this was nowhere near the THERMONUCLEAR EVENT that some analysts were promoting.

We all know what happened instead: By the fall, it had become a full-fledged religion and well on its way to mass-forming psychosis.

But in the early days, when things looked really bad, I thought it meant we would probably hear about once a week that someone in our extended family, circle of friends, or co-workers was going to die from this. Ditto for celebrities, the evening news would be flooded with odes and tributes to notable people who had just been felled by COVID. Perhaps one or more of my close relatives would die from this. Maybe I do. It was frightening.

From our vantage point here in early 2023, I can think of only three celebs who died with COVID: John Prine, Herman Cain, and much to the delight of the zerocovid madmen: Meatloaf.

On January 1, 2022, I suspected the pandemic was mostly over . During the main period of COVID, I lost about four people within my social circle, none to COVID or even to COVID. That figure does not include the two other people close to me who I knew committed suicide during the lockdowns.

So without prejudice to the tragedy of those 49,000 Canadians who have succumbed to COVID, my figure for the first question is zero.
Question #2) How many people do you know who have died ‚Äúsuddenly and unexpectedly‚Äù in the past 18 months?

Recall how I expected to hear at least once a week about relatives, acquaintances and colleagues who had died of COVID, but heard nothing.

However, when it comes to family members, friends and acquaintances who have died suddenly and unexpectedly from a heart attack or other unexpected medical event, in the past year to 18 months or so‚Ä¶well, that's a different story.

Read more

https://www.frontnieuws.com/ze-beloofden-veilig-en-effectief-we-kregen-plotseling-en-onverwacht/?utm_source=plugin&utm_medium=notification&utm_id=812096

group.title: We Love Trump!
